product.title: ION Audio Ion 4-in-1 Airstyler Long Barrel Attachments
product.description: These long barrel attachments are perfect for styling longer hair with your ion 4-In-1 Airstyler. These barrels are 6 inches long — compared to the original barrels that are 4.3 inches long. That’s almost 2 more inches to help achieve multiple faster styles on longer hair. You can create gorgeous long-lasting curls and waves with radiant shine. You can also dry and smooth your hair with these barrels. Remember the ion 4-In-1 Airstyler does it all! With advanced ceramic technology these barrels help eliminate frizz for smooth silky results. They also help speed up drying time making styling faster than ever.
product.description_html:
These long barrel attachments are perfect for styling longer hair with your ion 4-In-1 Airstyler. These barrels are 6 inches long — compared to the original barrels that are 4.3 inches long. That’s almost 2 more inches to help achieve multiple faster styles on longer hair. 



You can create gorgeous long-lasting curls and waves with radiant shine. You can also dry and smooth your hair with these barrels. Remember the ion 4-In-1 Airstyler does it all!



With advanced ceramic technology these barrels help eliminate frizz for smooth silky results. They also help speed up drying time making styling faster than ever.
product.description_full:
These long barrel attachments are perfect for styling longer hair with your ion 4-In-1 Airstyler. These barrels are 6 inches long — compared to the original barrels that are 4.3 inches long. That’s almost 2 more inches to help achieve multiple faster styles on longer hair. You can create gorgeous long-lasting curls and waves with radiant shine. You can also dry and smooth your hair with these barrels. Remember the ion 4-In-1 Airstyler does it all! With advanced ceramic technology these barrels help eliminate frizz for smooth silky results. They also help speed up drying time making styling faster than ever. * Left & right barrels for easy, even styling on both sides of your head
 * Ceramic technology for long-lasting, frizz-free results
 * 6” long for multiple, faster styles on longer hair
 * 6" Long
 * Not Compatible with New 8-in-1 Airstyler Pro
product.description_full_html:
These long barrel attachments are perfect for styling longer hair with your ion 4-In-1 Airstyler. These barrels are 6 inches long — compared to the original barrels that are 4.3 inches long. That’s almost 2 more inches to help achieve multiple faster styles on longer hair. You can create gorgeous long-lasting curls and waves with radiant shine. You can also dry and smooth your hair with these barrels. Remember the ion 4-In-1 Airstyler does it all! With advanced ceramic technology these barrels help eliminate frizz for smooth silky results. They also help speed up drying time making styling faster than ever.
  • Left & right barrels for easy, even styling on both sides of your head
  • Ceramic technology for long-lasting, frizz-free results
  • 6” long for multiple, faster styles on longer hair
  • 6" Long
  • Not Compatible with New 8-in-1 Airstyler Pro

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
